properties.name: notify.me.scheduled.email.cron
properties.description: Cron expression that determines when the collected emails should be send.  Default '0 12 * * * 0', every sunday at midday.

properties.name: notify.me.scheduled.staffing.incomplete.cron
properties.description: Cron expression that determines when the check for incomplete staffing of eventlines should run.  Default 0 4 * * * ?, every day at 4 in the morning.
